alert.note: Alert for Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:57PM CDT until June 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Parker County in north central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Western Lake, or 8 miles south of Weatherford, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Azle, Briar, Willow Park, Reno, Aledo, Hudson Oaks, Western Lake, Annetta, Lake Weatherford, Horseshoe Bend, Cresson, Annetta South, Annetta North, Sanctuary, La Junta, Tin Top, Highland Addition and Lake Granbury. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 403 and 422. Interstate 30 near mile marker 1. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Prepare immediately for large hail. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure and stay away from windows.
